list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a means of solving a problem or dealing with a difficult situation.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: there are no easy solutions to financial and marital problems
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Không có giải pháp dễ dàng cho các vấn đề tài chính và hôn nhân

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a liquid mixture in which the minor component (the solute) is uniformly distributed within the major component (the solvent).
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: a solution of ammonia in water
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: một dung dịch amoniac trong nước

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: the action of separating or breaking down; dissolution.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: the solution of British supremacy in South Africa
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Giải pháp tối cao Anh ở Nam Phi
